title: Navalny protests: Police clash with Navalny supporters
content: This video can not be playedThousands of people across Russia have been taking part in unauthorised protests to demand the release of the jailed opposition leader Alexei Navalny.Mr Navalny was jailed on his return to Russia after recovering from an attempt to kill him with a nerve agent.Footage from St Petersberg shows police clashing with Navalny supporters.
